summary: A comprehensive test suite that exercises the BackendSamplerV2 primitive, running a variety of quantum circuits with different parameters and execution options on multiple simulated backends, and asserting correct sampling results and proper error handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the BackendSamplerV2 component to guarantee reliable quantum sampling for applications that depend on accurate measurement outcomes and to support ongoing development and maintenance of the Qiskit primitives library.
